item.title: A better way of editing LaTeX
item.author: j.gs@e.com (Juan Sebastián Gaitán-Escarpeta)
item.description: In the life of a mathemathician, there is a big chunk of time dedicated to editing and formating LaTex documents. Some (even some mathemathicians) may think that this is just a small part of what we do, but in reality we spend more time that what we would like to admit writing and editing LaTeX documents.
